descriptionHTML:
Planning poker for the Android Wear operation system. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start planning poker.


Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Planning Poker" or say "Start planning poker"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Possibility of some sort of virus.  Uninstalled app from phone which is how you uninstall from the watch.  EVERY other app I've EVER uninstalled has uninstalled from my watch.  This one hangs on for dear life and will not uninstall.
